# new MB flux, numu mode, muon neutrino flux, the main component
beam_type=0
beam_energy = 0 7200 2.272e-12 8.566e-12 1.112e-11 1.335e-11 1.658e-11 1.82e-11 1.946e-11 2.045e-11 2.161e-11 2.241e-11 2.279e-11 2.292e-11 2.275e-11 2.253e-11 2.214e-11 2.156e-11 2.078e-11 1.992e-11 1.894e-11 1.789e-11 1.677e-11 1.558e-11 1.439e-11 1.318e-11 1.193e-11 1.069e-11 9.503e-12 8.356e-12 7.278e-12 6.292e-12 5.396e-12 4.601e-12 3.902e-12 3.285e-12 2.76e-12 2.312e-12 1.932e-12 1.616e-12 1.355e-12 1.138e-12 9.589e-13 8.15e-13 6.928e-13 5.937e-13 5.147e-13 4.478e-13 3.935e-13 3.5e-13 3.15e-13 2.867e-13 2.615e-13 2.409e-13 2.273e-13 2.11e-13 1.995e-13 1.92e-13 1.815e-13 1.726e-13 1.665e-13 1.601e-13 1.554e-13 1.493e-13 1.442e-13 1.412e-13 1.363e-13 1.323e-13 1.265e-13 1.217e-13 1.183e-13 1.14e-13 1.102e-13 1.06e-13 1.014e-13 9.7e-14 9.34e-14 9.001e-14 8.641e-14 8.19e-14 7.867e-14 7.464e-14 7.146e-14 6.812e-14 6.499e-14 6.185e-14 5.858e-14 5.614e-14 5.32e-14 5.016e-14 4.765e-14 4.561e-14 4.281e-14 4.087e-14 3.841e-14 3.632e-14 3.432e-14 3.263e-14 3.016e-14 2.857e-14 2.689e-14 2.529e-14 2.372e-14 2.227e-14 2.103e-14 1.957e-14 1.834e-14 1.73e-14 1.615e-14 1.513e-14 1.406e-14 1.303e-14 1.214e-14 1.129e-14 1.047e-14 9.569e-15 8.87e-15 8.148e-15 7.429e-15 6.765e-15 6.097e-15 5.492e-15 4.977e-15 4.445e-15 3.967e-15 3.492e-15 3.037e-15 2.595e-15 2.225e-15 1.854e-15 1.537e-15 1.22e-15 9.78e-16 7.842e-16 6.198e-16 4.786e-16 3.334e-16 1.971e-16 9.391e-17 2.738e-17 6.065e-18 4.135e-18 1.933e-18 9.888e-19 4.494e-20 0 
# the PDG code of the beam particle
# 12 - nu_e    
# 14 - nu_mu
# 16 - nu_tau
# -12 - anti_nu_e
# -14 - anti_nu_mu
# -16 - anti_nu_tau

beam_particle      = 14

# The direction of the beam given as a 3 coordinates of the vector alligned with the beam

beam_direction     = 0 0 1
